solution_line_template: Frodo has {frodo_more_than_lily} tennis balls more than Lily (who has {lily_balls}), so he has {frodo_more_than_lily}+{lily_balls} = <<{frodo_more_than_lily}+{lily_balls}={frodo_balls}>>{frodo_balls} tennis balls
Brian has twice as many as Frodo, which makes {frodo_balls}*{brian_times_frodo} = <<{frodo_balls}*{brian_times_frodo}={brian_balls}>>{brian_balls} tennis balls.
